name: M.E.A.T.
description:
M.E.A.T. is an early prototype for a fast, chaotic, arcade game in which your goal is to make money by shooting, slicing, or creating chaos to finish the recipe and get the correct ingredients into the pot.

Send us some feedback: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdvJ8gcmDH8xd__AKFfDeEoBxZPqFiV_1_M0nPt...
